MW-7428.description: .. raw:: html The component MotionWise Application S2S (short-name MA_COMS2S) shall move data between the Dex_Element interface and the ara::com Event interface, in both directions.
MW-7428.title: The component MotionWise Application S2S (short-name MA_COMS2S) shall move data...
MW-7428.verificationcriteria:
GIVEN: an Event mapped to a Dex_element (direction from SOA to Classic) 
WHEN: MA_COMS2S receives the Event from the ara::com::GetNewSamples() interface
THEN: MA_COMS2S sends Dex_element to the ms_net::Send() interface

GIVEN: an Event mapped to a Dex_element (direction from Classic to SOA)
WHEN: MA_COMS2S receives the Dex_element from the ms_net::Receive() interface
THEN: MA_COMS2S sends the Event to the ara::com::Send() interface

MW-7430.description: .. raw:: html To communicate with MotionWise Classic Host, MA_COMS2S shall use component MS_NET
MW-7430.title: To communicate with MotionWise Classic Host, MA_COMS2S shall use component MS_NE...
MW-7430.verificationcriteria:
GIVEN: a Dex_element that is intended to be produced by MA_COMS2S
WHEN: MA_COMS2S produces the Dex_element
THEN: MA_COMS2S uses the MS_NET interface Send()

GIVEN: a Dex_element that is intended to be produced by MA_COMS2S
WHEN: MA_COMS2S receives the Dex_element
THEN: MA_COMS2S uses the MS_NET interface Receive()

MW-7431.description: .. raw:: html To communicate with AUTOSAR Adaptive Applications, MA_COMS2S shall use AUTOSAR ara::com interface.
MW-7431.title: To communicate with AUTOSAR Adaptive Applications, MA_COMS2S shall use AUTOSAR a...
MW-7431.verificationcriteria:
GIVEN: an Adaptive Events that is intended to be produced by MA_COMS2S
WHEN: MA_COMS2S produces the Event
THEN: MA_COMS2S uses the ara::com interface Send()

GIVEN: an Adaptive Events that is intended to be received by MA_COMS2S
WHEN: MA_COMS2S receives the Event
THEN: MA_COMS2S uses the ara::com interface GetNewSamples()

MW-7935.description: .. raw:: html The Basic period is 10 ms.
MW-7935.title: The Basic period is 10 ms.
